## Summary

- What does this PR change and why?

## Type of change

- [ ] feat: new feature
- [ ] fix: bug fix
- [ ] docs: documentation only
- [ ] refactor: code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
- [ ] style: formatting, missing semi colons, etc; no code change
- [ ] perf: performance improvement
- [ ] test: adding or updating tests
- [ ] build/chore/ci

## Checklist

- [ ] Title follows Conventional Commits (e.g., feat: add X)
- [ ] Lint, typecheck, and build pass locally (npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build)
- [ ] Tests added/updated if applicable
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CHANGELOG) if applicable
- [ ] Screenshots or recordings for UI changes

## Related issues

- Closes #

## Notes for reviewers

- Any special considerations or rollout steps
